nodes.documentation:
@title TicketCreation contract
 @notice this contract mainly deals with account creation by users and ticket creation by contract deployer
nodes.name: TicketCreation

nodes.documentation: @notice creates an event whenever a new ticket is created by the contract deployer

nodes.documentation: @notice when contract is being deployed, the constructor sets contract deployer to be msg.sender and contract paused (circuit breaker) to be false

circuitBreaker().return: returns contractPaused as true or false depending on whether the circuit breaker is on or off

circuitBreaker().notice: circuit breaker function can only be called by contract deployer, when circuit breaker is on, any functions with this modifier will not go throughpurpose of circuit breaker is to put a pause on smart contracts in case of an attack by a malicious party

methods.constructor: when contract is being deployed, the constructor sets contract deployer to be msg.sender and contract paused (circuit breaker) to be false

createAccount(string,string).notice: function handles account creation by users who want to use the Dapp to purchase/resell tickets, user info is appended into the users array

createTicket(string,string,uint256).notice: function can only be called by contract deployer, handles ticket creationnew tickets are appended to the tickets array, and two relevant mappings are also updatedfunction emits an event whenever a new ticket is created

userdoc.notice: this contract mainly deals with account creation by users and ticket creation by contract deployer
